Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: String
Description: String composed of fourteen twisted linen threads of a light maroon colour. Each thread twists to the left and the return is on the right. The twist is intact and folded in half, in the middle of its total length, somewhere around 15,5cm. Both extremities are tapered.
